summary: Anna is a 16-year old in a village where women are accused of witchcraft. It's based on the witch hunts on Åland, Finland in the 1600s.
cast: Tuulia Eloranta|Magnus Krepper|Elin Petersdottir|Claes Malmberg|Kaija Pakarinen|Antti Reini|Lauri Tanskanen|Julia Korander|Johanna af Schultén|Kari Onstad Winge|Cris af Enehielm|Maria Sid|Pirkko Hämäläinen|Sonja Halla-aho|Clas-Ove Bruun|Frank Skog|Robert Enckell|Anssi Niemi|Laura Vaara|Marc Svahnström|Matts Stenlund|Sigge Svahnström|Eeva Putro|Kate Krumina|Edith Grahn|Jelena Beinerovica|Olavi Lahti|Helmi Lahti|Arja Pekurinen|Annica Sjölund|Carina Sommarström|Mieke de Vries|Jenny Broman|Ginta Ernstreite|Anna Moskvina|Tatjana Filipova|Madara Sture|Aris Rozentals|Andis Laganovskis|Maris Micerevskis|Ivans Kuncevics|Atis Brasmanis|Ivars Brakovskis|Laura Atelsone|Vita Berzina|Zita Krumina|Ilona Beijere|Romans Medvedevs|Agnese Virovska|Hannu Kahakorpi|Anniina Leppänen|Theofanis Kavvadas|Matthias Railo|Malin Nyqvist|Liina Kotkaniemi|Alma Kotkaniemi
title: La Prometida del Diablo
